name: Eat Bean: Another Plane
description:
ITCH.IO WEB VERSION COMING SOON, FOR WEB VERSION USE NEWGROUNDS LINK HERE: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/project/1888924

Embark on a brand new bean eating adventure!

Choose from a wide variety of bootleg lizards (or machines) !

Eat Bean!

Search Bean codes!

Stay awake.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD or Arrow keys
  • Eat: E or Z
  • Look: Q or C
  • Jump: Spacebar or X

Playtime: 10-20 minutes If web version is not loading correctly, try using the pc standalone version down below.
